item.title: PIG: Physics-Informed Gaussians as Adaptive Parametric Mesh Representations
item.description: Physics-Informed Gaussians (PIGs) revolutionize PDE solving by using adaptive, learnable Gaussian functions for superior accuracy and efficiency.
